gotchas_discovered: Dynamic key access pattern for border styles: `${elementName}Border`
Type assertion for border style conversion: `as any`
Force reload parameter for theme configuration

approach_outcome.notes: Successfully implemented singleton pattern with comprehensive theme management capabilities. Well-structured with proper TypeScript typing and blessed library compatibility.

recommendations: Consider adding theme validation methods to ensure consistency
Implement theme change event system for reactive UI updates
Add fallback mechanism for missing theme properties
Consider performance optimization for frequent theme access
Add theme documentation and examples for developers
